PrecisOrder (a) designating the MINISTER OF LABOUR as the "Appropriate Minister" with respect to: . (i) the Canada Labour Relations Board, and (ii) the Canadian Artists and Producers Professional Relations Tribunal, . in Schedule I.1 to the Financial Administration Act, and (b) striking out the reference to the Minister of Human Resources Development. .
